Body: Avoid these towels. Spend a few bucks more on better towels. These things were shedding and pilling like crazy right out of the gate. Just the large towels, though. I washed them a few time thinking they'd get better, but after three washes they still look like crap, and I bought them for my "guest" bathroom, so they have to look nice. Author: JAG
Title: Not a Thick Spa Towel
Body: Personally I don't care for those very very thick towels so I like these.  As far as all the complaints about the excess lint.....I washed this set by itself.  I have never washed towels with any other laundry; just bath towels alone.  Washed them twice; Warm water; to make sure all sizing was out.  NO fabric softener - all that does is make towels Less absorbent as it coats the fibers to make them feel soft; just plain white vinegar in the softener dispenser.  Med High spin speed to avoid wrinkles and excess dryness.  Towels in dryer on Low Heat with natural sheep's wool dryer balls.  The lint screen had more lint than when I wash our current towels but that's exactly what I would expect with new towels.I have no complaints; would recommend to anyone who prefers a thinner bath towel.
